title: Vijaya Bank Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Probationary Sr Manager & Chief Manager Posts
text: Vijaya Bank Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Probationary Sr Manager & Chief Manager Posts Vijaya Bank Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for Probationary Sr Manager & Chief Manager Posts: Vijaya Bank has invited applications for the recruitment of Probationary Chief Manager – Statistician in SMG Scale IV, Probationary Senior Manager – Risk Management, Probationary Senior Manager – Statistician vacancies in MMG Scale III in specialist category. Eligible candidates may apply online from 14-02-2017 to 10-03-2017.   application fee &   Vijaya Bank Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 06 Name of the Posts: 1. Probationary Chief Manager – Statistician: 01 Post 2. Probationary Senior Manager – Risk Management: 01 Post 3. Probationary Senior Manager – Statistician: 04 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 30 – 45 years for Post No 1, 2 & 25 – 37 years for Post No 3 as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST, 03 years for OBC and 10 years for PWD candidates & for other relaxation details refer the notification.   Post Graduation (Regular – Full Time) in Statistics or Econometrics with minimum 60%, Degree or Diploma in Risk Management/ Computer Application for Post 1, 2, Full time PG in Econometrics/ Statistics/ Risk Management/ Maths/ Economics/ Financial Engg or full time MBA in Finance or BE/ MCA/ B.Tech (Computer Science) or M.SC (IT). M.Sc (Computer Science) for Post 3 with relevant experience. Selection Process:   interview and/ or group discussion and/ or test. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 100/- (intimation charges only) for SC/ ST/ PWD candidates and Rs. 600/- (Including Rs. 100/- intimation charges) for all others including OBC candidates through online.   apply online through the website www.vijayabank.com from 14-02-2017 to 10-03-2017 & send hard copy of the online application with recent photograph should be affixed on the application along with all relevant documents and fee in an envelope should be super scribed with “Application for the Post of Prob. Chief Manager – Statistician, Prob. Senior Manager – Risk Management, Prob, Senior Manager – Statistician 2016 – 2017 in Vijaya Bank” by ordinary post to the Vijaya Bank, Post Box No 5136, GPO, Bangalore – 560 001 on or before 16-03-2017 & 20-03-2017 for far flung areas. Instructions for Apply Online: 1. Before applying online, candidates should have valid e-mail id, password. 2. Log on to the website www.vijayabank.com. 3. Click on careers & select desired post. 4. Click on “Click Here to Apply Online”. 5. Log in yourself & Fill all mandatory details. 6. Check once before submit the form. 7. Take a print out copy of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee 14-02-2017 Last Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee 10-03-2017 Last Date for Printing Application 25-03-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Hard Copy of the Online Application 16-03-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Hard Copy of the Online Application for Far Flung Areas 20-03-2017 For more details like pay scale, experience, reservation, duration   below… Vijaya Bank Recruitment 2017
